system.requirements: Reach 2,500xp Spent (or any multiple of 2,500). Optional, can choose to stick with current specialty and gain +5 to any one Characteristic character has an Aptitude in. Prerequisite: Ministorum Priest
system.descriptionText: The Rector Erudite seeks not spirtual leadership, nor the rabid zeal that many of their kin display. They are scholars, those of knowledge who may at a glance distinguish one minor cult from another, describe the particular rituals they employ, and upon which day in 835:M39 was their cult first noted. Often without being asked.
system.effects:
Replace Current Specialty's Aptitudes and Equipment with Rector Erudite. Apt: Fellowship, Intelligence, Knowledge, Perception, Social, Weapon Skill, Willpower
Add. Equipment: Ecclesiarchy Robes, Good Bolter or Good Flamer, Rosarius, Book of Scripture, Book of Lore. Gain Talents: Polyglot+Total Recall or Confessor
Can Purchase Unique Talent: Walking Archive, Record Keeper and Basic Order: Know the Heretic; Kill the Heretic!
